resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: A comrade protected the duelist from too dangerous slashing blows.
resource.chars: A comrade protected the duelist from too dangerous slashing blows.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Duelists fought each other with swords or rapiers.They were protected by a vest, an arm guard and a leather greave.
resource.chars: Duelists fought each other with swords or rapiers.They were protected by a vest, an arm guard and a leather greave.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M547.46327,263.79782h80.17382v0h80.17382v136.72655v136.72655h-80.17382h-80.17382v-136.72655z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_09c0cfd3-899a-4e8b-bc96-5885168e03a8" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: In the 19th, in Europe, Academic fencing or Mensur <span style="color: #202122; font-family: sans-serif;">is the traditional kind of fencing<span style="color: #202122; font-family: sans-serif;"> practiced by some student corporations. <span style="color: #202122; font-family: sans-serif;">The duelists were a blade away and weren't allowed to move their legs. Duelists were protected, but it was not uncommon to see students graduating with large facial scars.
resource.chars: In the 19th, in Europe, Academic fencing or Mensur is the traditional kind of fencing practiced by some student corporations. The duelists were a blade away and weren't allowed to move their legs. Duelists were protected, but it was not uncommon to see students graduating with large facial scars.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Different student corporations confronted each other in a duel. They differed by the color of their cap.
resource.chars: Different student corporations confronted each other in a duel. They differed by the color of their cap.
